topic.title: hi
topic.body:
im currently hosting zeronet 6 times, as to keep this site alive.
im setting up a call to arms for anyone who uses zeronet to host this on as much as possible.
if you host it even one time, please try to keep it up for as long as possible.

topic.title: hello again
topic.body:
ive been having lots of trouble with my internet so i no longer can host zeronet on 6 devices.
i do howerver have access to a server, so i am going to run it there.

-crayola

1611260804_17GmcqqqJdfEM4DkRsqvvprifPVwY.body:
now this
is what we need right now.
with windows, couldnt you set size limits to something like 1gb for zerotalk, 500mb for zeromail and 200mb for everything else, and just copy that folder?

1611606727_1LPWdVJ1GNU738u2VUkoZdw9B7u4V.body:
> [maibloggu](#comment_1_1AobZzmuEmdzAM9nzmHiM4TwM8meYJ19Pf): I don't know man, I do want to see zeronet alive again but I've been here for weeks now and it's still pretty dead.

that is true, and thats why we need to keep it alive. promote it as much as you can and its bound to grow

ahh, im stupid.
